save.enable.description: When enabled, every screenshot captured with HolzShots will be saved at the location specified under the setting "save.path".

save.path.description:
The path where screenshots will be saved.
Feel free to use environment variables like %USERPROFILE%, %ONEDRIVE% or %TMP%.

save.autoDetectBestImageFormat.description:
When enabled, HolzShots decides whether a screenshot should be saved as a JPEG or a PNG.
Some screenshots are better saved as JPGs, for example if they consist of a large photo.
Saving it as a PNG is better suited for pictures of programs.
If JPG is used, there may be a loss in quality. PNG does not reduce the image quality, but uses more space when photos are saved.

editor.closeAfterUpload.description: Close the shot editor once the upload button is clicked.

editor.closeAfterSave.description: Close the shot editor once the image was saved.

upload.showProgress.description: When set to true, HolzShots will show a progress flyout during upload.

upload.actionAfterUpload.description:
What will be done with the link that you get from your upload. Possible options are:
flyout: A popup-window in the corner that shows some options for copying the link
copy: Copy the link to the clipboard
none: Do nothing

upload.actionAfterUpload.copy.showConfir.description: Show a confirmation message as soon as the URL was copied and "upload.actionAfterUpload" is set to "copy".

upload.actionAfterUpload.flyout.closeOnC.description: Automatically close the flyout containing the URL to the image as soon as some button is pressed and "upload.actionAfterUpload" is set to "flyout".

upload.image.autoDetectBestImageFormat.description:
When enabled, HolzShots decides whether a screenshot should be uploaded as a JPEG or a PNG.
Some screenshots are better uploaded as JPGs, for example if they consist of a large photo.
Uploading it as a PNG is better suited for pictures of programs. If JPG is used, there may be a loss in quality. PNG does not reduce the image quality, but uses more space when photos are saved and therefore takes longer to upload.

upload.service.description: Name of the service HolzShots is goind to upload the image.

capture.actionAfterCapture.description:
What to do after an image got captured. Possible options are:
openEditor: Open the shot editor with the captured image
upload: Upload the image to the specified default image service
none: Do nothing (this would only trigger saving the image to disk if this is enabled)

capture.selection.dimmingOpacity.description: Opacity of the dimming effect when selection a region to capture. Must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

capture.delayInSeconds.description: Seconds to wait before invoking the capture. Must be >=0.

tray.doubleClickCommand.description: The command to execute when the tray icon is double-clicked.

key.enabledDuringFullscreen.description: Enable or disable hotkeys when a full screen application is running.

key.bindings.description: List of key bindings that trigger commands.
